snippet: Ken Paxton, who was elected in November, was booked in a case stemming from accusations that he misled investors and clients while doing securities work in the years before he became the state’s top lawyer.
abstract: Texas Atty Gen Ken Paxton is arrested on felony count securities law violations; allegedly misled investors and clients while doing securities work in years before he became attorney general; is released after posting $35,000 in personal recognizance bonds.
lead_paragraph: Ken Paxton, who was elected in November, was booked in a case stemming from accusations that he misled investors and clients while doing securities work in the years before he became the state’s top lawyer.

headline.main: Securities Fraud Charges Bring Texas Attorney General, Ken Paxton, to County Jail
headline.print_headline: Securities Fraud Charges Bring Texas Attorney General to County Jail
